resource.name: IHE_FormatCode_vs
resource.title: IHE ValueSet of Format Codes for use with Document Sharing
resource.description: The IHE FormatCode Value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by IHE http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=IHE_Format_Codes. This Value set additionally includes format codes defined by the HL7 CDA http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=CDA_Format_Codes_for_IHE_XDS. The set was listed in HITSP C80 Table 2-153 Format Code Value Set Definition. The use of the FormatCode specifies the technical format of the document. The FormatCode is a further specialization more detailed than the mime-type. The FormatCode provides sufficient information to allow any potential document consumer to know if it can process and/or display by identifying a document encoding, structure and template. The actual list of codes is intended to be extensible.
